review: The app has a few bugs with the mute button going on and off but I hope it stays invite only, it's a cool platform and safe space to have real progressive and productive conversations. Considering the climate we're in, I think something like this excluded to invite only is perfect considering there are a lot of "higher ups" on this app. 🔥

title: The best app to come out in 2020!!!
review:
I love this app. I can definitely see it being a long lasting app. The amount of topics and opportunities are endless....

I only have one COMPLAINT: I am unable to change my bio.... I wasn’t sure what to put but now that I know what I want, it is not a clear way to change it. The instructions don’t work. Please fix this.

Overall 10/10 app!!!!! Love it!!!!

title: A giant echo chamber
review: I guess the algorithm is connecting me to people I know but it’s becoming very narrow and linear. I’m not being exposed to new ideas and I’m seeing the same conversations about the same things and the same people. A lot of the topics I really don’t agree with but that’s no fault of the app. I feel like a lot of users are in a giant echo chamber like every other app and idk if it’s just me but when searching for new followers I’ve only seen black ppl who all believe the same thing and it didn’t feel too diverse.

title: A positive social network
review: I am enjoying the positivity and collaborative vibe at clubhouse. I think we are all tired of the mean angry Facebook arguments and I’m happy to move on to a positive experience. It is pretty intuitive. There are a lot of interesting people who are successful, funny, thought leaders and everyone talks. There isn’t video, so you don’t have to do your makeup, just bring yourself.

title: Information at the speed of sound
review: Just as the title implies, this is sharing information at the speed of sound! A social media app that is audio only is just what I didn’t know I needed!! Still some minor bugs to work out and I’m sure they will be... really looking forward to the day when Clubhouse integrates with Apple CarPlay (hint hint)

title: Breath of fresh air
review: I’m only a couple of days in but I really love the format for finding people sharing great information in interesting ways.  I just listened to a mostly female focused group discussing stocks and finance and learned a lot.  I think this can be a tremendous platform for learning and realtime engagement in a structured environment.  Feels intuitive for the most part and also fun to use.

title: Notification spam
review: This has to be the most annoying app I’ve ever downloaded. It spans you several times a day with notifications for stuff you didn’t ask for. Not to mention that the app itself is nothing special. It’s literally just a bunch of audio chat rooms. Not sure what anyone sees in this app. If you love being spammed with notifications all day long download this app, otherwise there are many better platforms out there for sharing information socially and or discussion.

title: The Key to all that is missing
review:
I’ve been on the app for 4 days and have learned more than I have in 5 years time. Everyone is so willing to help and be apart of your respected journey. And it is all done just in the hopes that you’ll succeed and prosper. This app is 🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🤘🏽🤘🏽🤘🏽💜💜💜🤘🏽🤘🏽🤘🏽

Things I think would help:

Moderator Ideas:
- Being able to close your room once your audience is obtain. To keep out unwanted difficulties.
-Only the Head Mod. should be able to end a room and/or make others Mod.
- Mods. shouldn’t be able to pull you up from the audience without you raising your hand. Sometimes I’m just there to listen and not speak.

Clifton L. Moffitt JR
IT Professional (Fed./Commerce)

title: HELP!!!! Amazing app but i have a suggestion!
review: Currently my phone is broken, i downloaded the app on my ipad after it broke and my texting is no longer synced to my ipad. So now i have no way of logging in even though i have an account. So my suggestion would be to have an email verification option. Just in case people need to use this for work and have happen what happened to me today 🤦🏼‍♀️😬 other than that i have no complaints about the app

title: Can we do something about the latency?
review: First, let me just say I love this app. Second, some friends and I were in a room the other day and we noticed that there is quite a bit of latency, so performing together is really not an option. Is there something we can do about this? Everyone had their audio quality set to high, and yet there was still a noticeable delay.

title: I’m addicted
review: This is one of the best apps. I have reconnected with friends, had the opportunities to speak with leaders in fields I wouldn’t have an immediate opportunity to be in a room with, and had amazing conversations about life. I don’t know if people can have the same open conversations once the app is public, but right now I’m having intellectual conversations and I’m addicted.

title: Membership Me Please
review: So I gave 4stars because I haven’t been able to get an invite yet or accepted.. However, I have heard so much about this new app that I have to get in... ASAP!! People keep telling me I must be invited or be the chosen one (be selected) and I’m like well I am the chosen one.. Hopefully someone in administrations see’s this and approve a gal, sooner than later lol.. I MUST SEE WHAT ALL THE FUSS IS ABOUT!! Respectfully!

title: Good idea, some flaws that should be easy to correct
review: Love the app so far, learning something new everyday but the ability to restrict content or what other users can see should be a priority in addition, when in club house though the audio is annoying as it doesn’t sync up to the phone very well like with audio levels and it doesn’t show in audio “playing” area like it would eight a podcast,music, etc

title: Great Idea, Poor Layout
review: This App could be much cleaner, along with access to your own personal interests. I would also like the option to build my own calendar of talking events to tune into, that does not include suggestions I’m not interested in. But, there is great potential to participate in significant, long-form conversations. Lastly, the App icon is annoying. I don’t want to see some stranger’s face on my phone. So, I put the App off my main display page.

title: Cool app, but needs work on relevant groups
review:
It’s a cool concept, sometimes it can be pretty interesting and you can sit in on a conversation that’s like panel at a conference. And of course there are also smaller groups where you can join in and chat. 

My main issue though, is even after selecting my “interests”, I keep getting recommended groups that I have completely zero interest in. So I often have to search for a while to find a group that interests me.

title: Love it but needs a way to sift out rooms you would never go in
review: I’m really loving this app, it’s come just in time, people are connecting in ways other platforms don’t allow them. I just wish I could remove rooms Im not interested in on my feed to make room for rooms that I am interested in. Also it would be helpful to be able to see how long room has been open before entering.

title: I love clubhouse
review: I love this app because it allows for a lot of shifts to manifest and Im confident if the founders keep an independent track and focus on fixing bugs and making the UI more scalable plus a couple of features it will be one of the big wins of 2021. I have some ideas for implementing empathetic features and would love to speak with someone internally.

title: URGENT TO CONSIDER
review:
This APP is amazing btw. I love it because it is an outlet for me and I get to talk and share so with many people.
 However the issue is privacy, some people record conversations and share them without consent to third parties and this in turn worries that it’s not safe to be free on this APP if there’s no respect to what someone is saying and assure safety.

title: some things I wish they include
review: clubhouse is lit!! but I wish they provide a way to pin the rooms I’m interested in, so they stay on top in case I want to go back and forth between rooms without needing to scroll!! Also, it would be cool to provide some background sounds like claps to make it more attractive and not too quiet for social rooms☺️🤓 THANKS

title: Nope. No way.
review:
The app demands access to your contacts before you can send out an invitation.  I don’t give other people’s info to a developer I don’t know personally and trust implicitly.  That’s a Facebook level of overreach. 

Second complaint: I found that I was somehow following a bunch of people I’d never heard of and didn’t care about, so I started unfollowing them.  The app threw up an alert and wouldn’t let me continue removing them.   EXCUSE ME?  You’re vetoing my decision of who I follow?  

This app is a very poor implementation of some very bad ideas.

title: Best App Ever
review: I’m in love with this app! I literally found my mentor on here. This app is amazing because you can connect with many different people. Making new friends!! I just love this app. The only bad thing is you have to wait until you get an invite from someone in your contacts in order to join & rn it’s only for apple users.

title: Error
review:
My confidant(I’ll leave it at that) used up both his or her invites to try and get me in, and indeed I did receive both of them via iMessage but when I used my number on the clubhouse app it isn’t letting me in.
The first one I believe didn’t work because of the fact that it had a us tag at the beginning, but that shouldn’t have even counted because my number can’t even be a valid us number. And when she tried to change the format to my country I once again got it but it still didn’t work. Very disappointed.

title: Invitation Issue
review:
It appears that there is an issue with sending out invitations to people in your phone book. Three days after I downloaded the app that function disappeared and I am no longer able to send invitations to friends.  

This is disruption in the user experience area as I would love to share the app with my family but in order to do so I have to go back into the App Store to share it from that page. 

Developers please fix this user ability problem.

1. Please add a function to favourite the rooms to join them later and look for them all over again
2. Please make it possible to hide rooms you’re not interested in and don’t want to see for good, they keep popping out, or possibility to block rooms by key words.
Thank you! Enjoying the app!
title: Some advice

review:
I’ve been trying to be verified for about 1 1/2- 2 months now and nothing. I’ve tried other numbers too but I guess you have to have a decent following. APP is deleted because I haven’t been able to use to it like 2 months now. They say they’re “working on it” and don’t want it to be “exclusive” but I think they actually like the fact not a lot of people can access. 
They say they’re a small team and it’s gonna take a while but Everytime I check there’s always an update for the app so I’m good off this.
title: Verification is RIGGED

review: Being on social media has always been a chore. What picture to post? What content will attract followers? Club House changed the game. It connected me to my social media and the relationships are richer, more authentic and real. Where can you have a meaningful conversation with someone from Germany, New York and Los Angeles simultaneously. I love Club House!
title: My New Home is a Club House

review:
As a person who likes “exclusive” stuff, I love this app. Just the fact of being able to listen and talk with a lot of like minded people and entrepreneurs that are not easy to access is Amazing. 
This app is like an interactive live podcast. 
Love it so much! Thank you Clubhouse :)

Ps.  Keep it “exclusive” to wither out people not need it on this app! It’s nice to be the “cool” kid.
title: Love the fact it is “Exclusive”

review:
There is no way to change your information on the app. I recently had to change my number and my account is attached my my old number. I’ve emailed clubhouse more than 12 times asking them to change the information over. No one has responded.   
They have no way for you to do this yourself and then they ignore you. I loved it when I could use it. But I do not want to start over. I had plenty of followers. I wish someone would help me. This is so disappointing.
title: The support email doesn’t work

review: Add and option for comments... I’d like to be able to clap or use other emojis while in conversation... keep the app invitation only ( like FB was in the beginning) and limit the size of  rooms. If I see a room with 5k ppl in there I wont enter because the wait time to great to the stage if ever would be too great. Didn’t like it at first because it reminded me of a party line but I’m addicted now 😩😩.
title: Just one request

review: Clubhouse has helped me feel connected to the community during a time when I need it most. The drop in audio chat format makes it very easy to listen in or join conversations similar to how you would at a dinner party.
title: A great way to feel connected during quarantine

review:
Sorry for long title. I don’t know how to describe how excited I am of this new app!
It feels like when you first fall in love, you know? That feeling? Well. This app amazed me as soon as I entered the first room, and I don’t even know anybody there, but you feel part of them because you interact too! What else you need?
title: First review I write for a Social Media App

review: Please read after you create I warn you do not send invites right away because they’ll be a list of invites you can send and you may accidentally think your sending a lot but really you only get two I made the mistake and can’t get those inviteseback 🤦🏽‍♂️
title: Things to know before sending invite

review: This is a good app, my suggestion is why don’t they have a room searching mechanism to search rooms and clubs and people at the same time like there’s a where you could search the rooms where you could search for clubs and where you can search for people
title: Suggestion

review: Participating in conversations with others or just even enjoying a discussion ) since the pandemic & today’s texting society is almost a lost art.  This brings it back!   Thank you for the ability to network & meet people with the same interests .
title: Fits a niche that I didn’t know I was missing

review: Great platform to hear from Major Players in a lot of different industries and getting little Nuggets of info I can use in my life and business!  When you can hear from and actually Talk to Multimillionaire’s & Billionaires is incredible! I’ve been telling everyone! Hope it puts Facebook out of Business!
title: Kw Agent

review:
Let me start by saying Clubhouse is an amazing app, however, it could use an incognito feature - one that allows users join rooms without notifying their followers. 

It’ll also be amazing to hide the room a user (with the incognito feature) is in from the corridor to promote privacy.
title: We need an incognito feature

review: I love this app! I’ve gotten so much great insight and support in such a short time. The only thing I would suggest is the option to hide what room you’re in on the side where it says you’re online. Sometimes the topics are things that I wouldn’t necessarily want to share with a colleague, like domestic violence or marriage issues.
title: Love this app

review:
For social media this doesn’t create a safe enough space for women or lgbt+ BIPOC people. If you want to talk to racial supremacist, heteronormative, “just asking questions” types then it’s perfect for you.

This is a special social media place for hoteps and pick-mes who they will never date can fester ideas on how to control women and non heteronormative people. 

This is not a safe space for lgbt+ people either, because just because something shares the tag doesn’t mean they support it. This app hands any old silly with an opinion and opportunity to do what Facebook is getting in trouble for, Creating a safe space for anti human extremism. 

Until better protections are in place for Women and LGBT+ people it’s just another social media outlet that will fuel the sort of misinformation that harms populations that need protecting. 

If that’s for you go ahead and have fun.
title: Hotel Heaven not lgbt+ friendly

review: Just scary to think what will happen when it’s open live to the public . It should stay exclusive, so many intellectual conversations to be had, I would hate to see it ruined by paid adds and people who don’t really want to network and build with others .
title: Greatest social app I’ve ever used

review: Club house has been an awesome experience this far!!. It’s a great alternative to the traditional podcast style format. I love hearing people talk about various issues and topics that you would otherwise not be privy to. It giveaways marginalized people a voice and amplifies those that already have loud voices. Keep up the great work!!
title: Loving it this far!

review: I’ve been in enough rooms by now that the things I’m hearing and witnessing are so messed up. An agent the other day in a Group was complaining how actors aren’t always available AT ALL TIMES and the actor responded saying “well you can always get off of clubhouse and call your clients if it is serious. And I 100% agreed. And it’s in his right to...have a conversation? And instead, the moderator muted the actor so he couldn’t even defend himself and then his agent dropped him. DROPPED. HIM. Because he had an opinion. Wow. Deleting this app ASAP.
title: Ruins your career

review:
If you are mindful of your privacy and want control over who is finding you on this app, do not download and join it. I am actually very upset with this platform. 

Despite choosing to not sync my contacts with the app, the app still synced my contacts. And upon my arrival into the platform after choosing my interests, I was thrown a Welcome, Name 🎉 party that held people from my contacts list who I avoid in life and online. As someone who has been cyberstalked before, this was very, very jarring.
title: Shockingly Callous with Privacy

review: This is an excellent platform for sharing and receiving information. It allows you to listen or share without the intimidation or over obligation factor. I’m not usually very open to communicating with people I do not know personally, but Clubhouse has a variety of ways to  “ice-break”, brand, build, and educate. I love it so far.
title: Champayne Desir

review:
It would be better to have the light when someone is talking another color besides the light grey. 
Also please allow us to customize our display names. The name can show when our profiles are visited but please allow a display name option.
title: So far so good. A few suggestions

review: I think the app needs an instruction page. As someone who just got in and messing around to figure out what’s what, would’ve been much easier if there was instructions. Also wish there were search pages to find chat spaces on specific subjects: ie: #business, #entrepreneur, #woodshop, #travel, etc.
title: Room for improvement

review: It’s annoys me that Someone could report you and you get suspended for a week it’s a lot of haters out here so i recommend this feature to get change or lower the days of the suspension cause it’s ridiculous if a change don’t come this app will end up crappy like Facebook sorry not sorry!!
title: WAY TO EASY TO GET SUSPENDED

review: Your app is a Genius creation keep brainstorming. I’m a video editor and I do so much more. I made a video about my club on clubhouse and I added two of the founders of clubhouse to my video on my Instagram, you can find me as independend_business_owner I hope you like the video and I hope we could network together.
title: The Vibe AkA Muhammad Rahim Alli

review: It’s been a while since a social media app came out that I’m PUMPED about. Clubhouse is it! I love this app so much have already told so many friends! Great for business connections, it’s like walking into a hallway where each door has its own networking event where you can have a free ticket to speak and ask the speakers questions! It’s the bomb!
title: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!

review: Thanking God for giving the vision. It has been such a blessing meeting people around the world. The voices of each individual carries a magnitude of silence, listening with an open heart of the stillness rings sounds to an awakening of a soul desperately needed to be raised up for God’s purpose. I got my Jumpstart when I entered into a clubhouse room hosted by Minister LaTBoyd. The word of God Speaks VOLUMES!!!!! Thank You.
title: Clubhouse Review

review: I am really enjoying this app, it is my first day. It is so easy to maneuver and understand. Having a small computer background, I find the optics and analytics are intriguing. I will be learning more over the weeks and hope to start my own Clubhouse. See you all in the hallways!!!!
title: First Day

review:
A notes section. 
There’s a lot of information and lessons to be learned in this app. 
I think a notes section/chat would be perfect for this. A lot of gems dropped and I wish as a moderator I could post the objective or highlights of the talk. This is especially necessary for audience members that come in later on in the talk.
title: The one thing this app is missing...

review: I thought this app was a professional place to connect. I used my business name as my user name. They said that flagged my account and kick me out. I met some awesome people right in the middle of this. I emailed them and they said they would get back to me in two days. I just feel like this could’ve been handled a different way. You could’ve at least emailed me. I would’ve switched my name from my business name to my personal name. Did you have to really kick me out after making so many wonderful connections. Bad business
title: Confused

review: The only thing that would add to this app is a chat box. Because having so many people on that stage it causes people to over talk each other. Also it would make people who are just dropping in the room and don’t know anyone feel more comfortable to contribute

review: From what I can tell already it is a platform of connection and information and inspiration. Whoever thought of this idea really sat down and really took time to figure out what’s going on in the world and what people are really wanting to say and how they’re wanting to be heard so that’s really beneficial

During a Pandemic where we are socially distancing Clubhouse has found a way to help up socially connect once again. There is something for everyone and if you don’t find your niche ... it’s easy to create one!

review: Clubhouse is an aimful platform with little to no distractions disguised as features. Its a purposeful application comprised of thought leading conversationalists, found in ‘rooms’ of think tanking; real-time, round the clock masterclasses on industry, professions, entrepreneurship, and politics. It’s a much more than social media. An environment of meaningful exchanges.

review: Had just an amazing experience in clubhouse for my very first time learning from entrepreneurs that are out there for online marketing strategies that work evidently and it’s so refreshing to to hear all these different people and just super powerful words of wisdom coming across and this is just inspirational!

review:
This is app has quickly become such a feel-good part of my day. I love interacting with new people, and I am enjoying the promoting and sharing of such awesome ideas from others.

This app makes the assumption that people will drop everything they are currently doing and start listening in when someone they like/follow comes online. I have a full time job and a 2yrs old to take care of, so this whole idea of drop everything and listen to Clubhouse does not work for me. Also, 

Where is the record feature when you can’t drop in to listen?

Having to ask Anyone for an invitation is nothing less than disrespectful

I hope this app continues to grow because I can see this going very far!!! Love it!!

review:
Lovely app, yet the user interface needs lots of work.
First of all, need to show who’s the person who’s invited.. that’s really useless 
Second, the active rooms appear in a very boring way.. also sometimes I dont know when did they start the group or for how long, so it will be nice to see a time duration of the active group.
Also, to let the speaker’s icon pop up on the top so we don’t keep scrolling and searching for whoever is speaking at the moment. 
I’m facing poor connection trouble with this app and I’m not sure if someone else is facing the same, my network is strong and I have no issues with other apps except this one, it keeps disconnecting. 
All the best!

review: I've truly enjoyed this app since I've joined. It far exceeds my expectations especially since it's still in beta testing. I've got to experience rooms with some big names in industries that I'm apart of to gain knowledge and genuinely network with others. I'm so happy that the app is constantly evolving.

review:
This app is addicting but in a good way!  

I wanted to add a suggestion:
I only have certain times during the work day that I’m available to truly focus and even participate in a conversation. But scrolling thru the list of 100s conversations going on  just to find scheduled chats is frustrating. Can we add calendar search feature that allows us to put in day & time to see what conversations are scheduled? 

Thanks again for reminding us what social media is truly about, organic conversations and networking with new people!

This would allow you to listen in but also leave the room without having to manually do so on the app. Similar to the feature of podcast. Just my two cents.

review: Love the idea of communicating with others by actually having a conversation. In a world where everyone cares mainly about texting it’s always a good idea to step out of your comfort zone. I’ve been using the app for over a month now, so far no issues whatsoever. Great work 👍🏾

review:
That’s basically what this app is. 
If you enjoy audio chatter/discussions with random people this might be fun. 
I get the appeal of the group chat without the need to worry about camera appearance. Usually I can also just not turn on my camera. 
Dunno. Feels flat to me plus audio only without the chat boxes means I can’t pick up and go, it needs to be intentionally scheduled time to sit down and listen in / participate. 
Can’t really use this while watching a show, let’s say. Or read a chapter in a book and swap to this. 
If you really like talking to people, or listening to random people talk about stuff, this might be for you. Matter of taste I suppose.
title: Audio only interactive podcasts

review: App continues to improve but the content is hit or miss. Most of the clubhouse sessions that I've joined have wasted the first 10-15 minutes introducing the panel members. That's a great way to bore audience members and have them not pay attention and leave. Would be better to introduce the session and  first panel member to speak and introduce the others only as they get a chance to speak.

review: Clubhouse is a beautiful shift in how we connect as beings. While you’ll occasionally find the worst of social media, more than anything you’ll discover beauty, insight, community building, equity and wisdom. The platform is inspiring, creative, transformative and beyond up lifting. Who knew that such goodness would emerge in the world ?

You can audibly hear people’s passion or tone, making it a new personal way to connect, get inspired, share, and learn.
title: Loving the personal connection!

review:
I was going to invite a friend to check it out until the app insisted on my entire contact list being the price for doing so.  No thanks.

Aside from that, this is just random and irrelevant.  Why this vs. some other social media site?  Oh, audio you say?  Nah, I don’t trust the developers with my data already and I have only used the app for several minutes.

The recommendations are sloppy and irrelevant, so why would I have any reason to go down a rabbit hole farm?

#ThatDudeSirraj

title: I’m very excited about this app!
review: Once I got my invite, I was very excited about the potential of a social app for having conversations. One thing that turned me off was some chats are race specific. Almost all people in America want to communicate as human beings

title: Why Contact list access?
review:
There’s no good reason Clubhouse needs full contact list access to invite others. It seems like a way to harvest 100s of millions of phone numbers. That’s going to end up with more robocalls for everyone. 

I have made social mobile apps before and it’s easy to safely invite others using apple and google’s frameworks without giving up you whole contact list. 

If clubhouse gets hacked or they sell their database, someone is going to get over 500 million phone numbers. This is a recipe for disaster and should be stopped immediately. (6 million users * 150 contacts per user - duplicates = ~500 million contacts total)

The contact list notification box doesn’t follow apple’s privacy guidelines.

title: Amazing
review: This is absolutely amazing! I’m listening to an abundance of people from all over the world discuss topics that I care about and I get to chime in. It’s live in living color coming through my speaker. I’m so impressed, pleasantly surprised and very happy! Thank you for this platform!

title: Excellent social media app to gain knowledge and/or influence.

title: Fake privacy and even faker reviews.

Ladies and gentlemen this is facebook level of privacy which is basically a non existent curtain. Not even an option to delete the account; have to contact the support and then over a week or two they MIGHT respond. Pathetic.

I’ve made some connections and had to take the conversation to what’sapp. It would help a lot with engagement keeping the conversation in app.

title: It’s got that new car smell
review: It’s a great network to meet here listen and a great collaborate and more I think it’s really gonna takeoff and if you’re lucky enough to jump on I highly recommend it don’t hesitate just to see what happens you never know.

title: Ease of Use
review: I love how you can jump into just about any kind of conversation you want and not only connect but hear some amazing information.  So much more effective way to spend time. It’s like hanging pit on a college quad and mixing it up with all the cool groups!  LOL

title: Intriguing conversations - should get better
review: I can imagine that this will only get better as there are more people and this Kore topics that get discussed. Right now it’s fine for when I want to listen to something whole on a walk.

title: Just Different and Timely
review: Clubhouse is so many things wrapped in one. Great for networking, a great way to learn and great space to share your own knowledge and insight. I’ve connected with so many people in such a short time and have gained knowledge and even clients. Super appreciative.

title: Feleisha
review: I love that you can enter different rooms and hear conversations that help you in your life’s journey. You  don’t have to pay to hear from people you wouldn’t normally be able to hear or speak with. Rich information..It’s Genius.

title: Invite
review: I don’t see why my two invites are already sent to two old numbers I have stored in my phone when I have never invited anyone before. For days on end I’ve looked for a way to get my invites back as it seems to be some sort of glitch within the system. This is really the only issue I have with this platform.

title: Cool Idea / Horrible Experience
review:
Not sure why I had such a bad time with this app. I bought into the premise early on and was excited when a distant acquaintance accepted my request. 

I was so disappointed by the rooms I was presented. Most of the content on this app boiled down to people stuck in MLMs, guys talking about Bitcoin, SEO gurus talking about grant cardone and people trying to kick off a career in public speaking. 

There were two cool rooms that I found that were centered on counseling and therapy. But other than that, garbage.

title: Great App
review: Love the idea behind this. This service was long over due. If anything maybe add an option to add music to profiles for people networking can check out & an option to add additional photos to the profile.

title: 5683Kim
review: I absolutely love the integrity, creativity and genius of a safe space and place you can build community and connect. It feels like podcast coming  alive be allowing us to view and see others enjoying it with you !

title: App sign up is weird
review: I have tried to sign up and my account to attend a meeting and it is stuck saying I will receive a text when my account is ready.  This might be an app I’m going to pass on if this continues.  Sorry

title: A game changer fit social media!
review: This app is networking on steroid.  The ability to connect with people that you wouldn’t have had the ability to connect with is refreshing!  Clubhouse has come along and stolen the show!!

title: Connecting to Instagram
review: I haveI uninstalled this app multiple times and added it back. I still can’t connect my Instagram account to the clubhouse app. I have sent in multiple tickets but I have not gotten an answer as to what is the problem other than that it is an amazing app.

title: Complicated joining and the invites
review: The method in which you are able to join is through an invite which you need to gain credits for as you listen to talks. I find this quite discouraging and frustrating- You shouldn’t have to listen to random talks in order to gain the right to invite. What happened to freedom of choice and freedom of speech?

title: iPad version perhaps
review: I like the exclusivity of this social media apps. love the concept, lot of things could be learned through every room provided in-apps. I wish it’s available for iPad so I can still use my phone for something else.

title: Love Clubhouse
review:
I don’t feel socially distanced because I am talking to people daily, learning stuff, sharing knowledge, encouraging people while others are inspiring me. I’m praying with people around the clock and learning about other cultures (I am now an American with a British accent, lol)!!!
The app is sooo much fun.

title: Where your voice is heard
review: Clubhouse is a platform where “we all have a voice.” Your voice is worth sharing. Your story is worth being heard. It’s a space for us to find our voice and our tribe.

title: Something is wrong!
review: There is something really wrong with this app. I have been invited by 3 friends of mine whom are on the app and it never goes through! We have literally tried everything. They have invites and when they send me the info it crashes. Ugh.... so frustrating as I wanted to bring business opportunities to the platform😡

title: Get in the Clubhouse NOW!
review: I NEVER make reviews for apps, but I would do myself and others in the Clubhouse a disservice If I didn’t let everyone know how powerful this app is. The connections and knowledge you can gain from this app is unmatched. See you on the inside!

This app has taken the world by storm. This app has taken me by storm. It would be outstanding to be able to use this app with Car Play - otherwise too dangerous to mute/unmute mic (don’t do this as a driver!)

Also really need dark mode to save my eyes. I stare at this all the time. 

Otherwise would be nice to improve search features - search filters by followers/following and adding people to clubs. 

Otherwise I couldn’t think of more for this wonderful app.
title: Need Car Play app and dark mode

review: It’s in its own league. There is an intense need now for deep & meaningful connection with others. Clubhouse provides for this in the best way possible. It’s like Woodstock meets Burning Man meets a TedTalk. Prepare for radical transparency and authenticity in an intimidate setting that only audio  delivers.
title: Don’t Call it A Social Network!

review: The app lets all of your contacts know of your presence as soon as you enter the app. It will show everyone who has invited you even thou it might be a random invite and the person might be someone you dont want to be associated with and they WILL NOT LET YOU REMOVE YOUR ACCOUNT. I REPEAT. YOU CAN NOT REMOVE YOUR ACCOUNT. They tell you to send an email to the company to request deletion and they won’t even answer the emails. Please dont let these people steal your data like I did.
title: CLEAR BREACH OF YOUR PRIVACY

review: I blocked someone yet they’re still following me which is weird. Plus I wish you could delete someone off of your follow list, that would’ve been easier than blocking them. Please fix :) other than that I love the app and can’t wait to see where it will be in the future!!
title: One huge concern

review:
With the Covid -19 Plandemic blindsiding communities and personal ,spiritual and social connection to the outside world... Clubhouse has been a phenominal resource tool and therapeutic audio medicine microphone that has re inspired my love appreciation and soulful link to a variety of wonderful people globally. As a teacher of esoteric wisdom through Kaballah, my clientele has dramatically grown and im blessed to be leaving to Hawaii to meet up with a new friend met on ClubHouse....thank you thank you thank you Clubhouse creators and Staff.
Sincerely-
Jahmal
Djedmaleye on fb
Djedmaleye9
Hawks Apparel on ig
title: Clubhouse- the Game changer and gift of 2020 and beyond

review: I don’t think have ever been on the edge about social media app ... I reserved my account name two days ago still waiting on an invite and am super hyper about this can’t wait the suspense is killing me ☺️🥺
title: Waiting for my invite been 2 days now

review: This app is great for hearing SOME perspectives. But I think there should also be a text chat option during these conversations to keep the conversation going if the moderators decide not to let other audio into the chat.
title: Great but...

review: I love the concept of this app. You really get to connect & network with others from all around the world while getting to put a voice to someone’s profile picture. Keep this app invite only!
title: Love this app!!

review: I really needed this app. Hearing so many discussions across the world and learning other people’s world view has been enlightening and interesting. I’ve spent hours on this app since downloading and I don’t see that changing anytime soon.
title: Needed this app

review: It’s been weeks now and I haven’t received a text to get in yet. This process is ridiculous because I really want to get in to start using the app but they’re team is super slow. This is a very odd process IMO.
title: Wait list

review: Just joined ! Really great app so far I am still figuring out the logistics of the app . I think you should be able to comments in chat rooms even if you don’t want to voice in maybe a comment or to. But overall great app .
title: So much fun !

review: It’s so addicting 😊 , you just want to come back for more every day! Such great amount of knowledge and insights from different subjects all in one place! Thank you to the creators and everyone who brings this app together!
title: Amazing!

review: This is a great place to catch up with friends and meet new people. A bit slow to respond to invitations of new users. If someone doesn’t send you a invite you’re going to be waiting a while to get in!
title: Great App!

review: I have enjoyed clubhouse a lot. However I have been unable to login for 2 days now and keep getting an SSL error message and so far no one seems to know why? I’ve delete and re-downloads the app with no luck.
title: Great at least when working

review:
Honestly, this app is a breath of fresh air in regard to social media and connections. My biggest problem is the fact that this recent update made it so the app is literally unusable. I received an RSS error from my phone in the US, from my US provider and have not been able to reconnect.

I still get pinged and messages about rooms, but it doesn’t open for me.
title: The app is great, but the update is bad

review: So the only complaint i have so far is that because i log out of apps when im not using them....this one included. I tried logging back in using the only option available and it says the system says ive used this feature too many times and im locked out. Interesting.
title: Locked out?

review: I’ve only been a part of clubhouse for about three weeks and I have to tell you the connections I am making are so great I have finally found my people on social media!
title: Unbelievable soooo good!

review:
It was great to hear so much information about Monytize. I checked it out and love it. I’m signing all family relatives and friends up as soon as it launches. Please let me know because we are so ready also thanks. 
Freda Lackey
title: Monytize

review: Really interesting to use this app. But i have one question. Sometimes i left my phone somewhere. I use an AirPods. Is that possible to make turning on/off micro by pushing button on AirPods? It would be really useful. Thank you!
title: Awesome app!

review: Guys please notice after you delete the app from home screen, you can not re download it!! maybe thats a BIG BUG , but i faced it and I can not download it, even after restart my iphone the app still in home screen but just as a name and i'm no able to redownload it again. ( the cloud logo is changed to OPEN) but there is no real app to open !! please fix it ☹️
title: After delete app unable to install again
Preparing Your Home For Today’s Market
review:
I was invited by Erica Covelle to be the Moderator & I was blown away with the value everyone brought. Not knowing a whole
Lot about the Real Estate Industry, I have a deeper respect for Real Estate Agents, their attention to detail and the passion they bring to their profession!

title: Can you explain a little how was my contact uploaded and used?
review: I have a few company testing numbers which were not shared/used anywhere else. Since I gave the permission to read my contacts for invitations, I have been receiving spam text on those numbers...might be a coincidence but i cannot tell for sure. this is the only app that I had given permission to read contacts in a while.

title: Historic
review: I never leave reviews but this app will go down as one of the best ever due to the concept. I have made so many connections and talked to some industry vets id never imagine talking to. Afraid that when the app goes public it will change.

title: Ideas
review: It would be nice if we could turn out profile maybe a different color based field on our business is in and we would receive suggestions for groups that peek what we say we are interested in

title: Mental awakening
review: Clubhouse has various (rooms), town hall like meeting sanctuaries. I like the fact I can always find a room to feed me mentally, quicken my taste for entertainment. As well just to chill out and relax! Salute to the creators so far my most favorite Soci Media Space!

title: It feels like the beginnings of Internet.
review: It feels like the beginnings of Internet when you used to spend hours and hours in IRC chat rooms. The perfect storm at the perfect time when we need to reconnect one with another.

title: Great concept and wonderful conversation setup
review: This is the kind of app that becomes what you make of it. There are plenty of high quality people here and I can’t wait to meet more of them!i

title: OBSESSED
review: I love the concept of this app and am on it constantly. I hope they include a “not interested” type button like Facebook and TikTok because some of the rooms are really not relevant to me or my interests that are showing up. Besides that it’s great

title: took my invites??
review: when you send an invite to the wrong number there’s no option to unsend...and now you gotta find a way to tell the person who was excited about the doggone invite that theryre not getting it... let alone telling two people who dont even know each other that youre gonna send them invites and now you have to tell both of them you cant because sending that one wrong invite took both invites at the same time and now we’re all disappointed and you don’t understand why both invites disappeared :/

title: Selective
review: Apparently the more selective they are with letting people have a page, the more popular the app becomes. I’ve been waiting, but if someone gets an invite they can get right in. Reminds me of a invite only social club.

title: Love the app!
review: I’ve only been on the app for 24 hours and I love it. Being that I am new to the app I tend to listen more than I speak. With that in mind, I wish there were more ways for the audience to interact with speaker such as claps, hearts, etc.

title: Minor accessibility issues for blind people
review: I love the app, especially because it is sound bass. The only problem is related to some minor accessibility issues for blind people, while working with voiceover.

title: Amazing Business Networking App
review: Wish there was a way to verify why people are joining. Lots of trolls and unwanted people who just join for fun. Surely should stay by invite only in my opinion to keep the kids and trolls off. Great idea. Great timing to kick this app in play!

title: Broken
review: I had my clubhouse working perfectly fine until all of a sudden it logged me out and every time I click something it exits out of the app. I have re-installed it mant times and even powered of my ipad but it won’t work.

title: Work in progress
review: I wish there was some mute button that could be used to cut off audio from a room instead of entirely leaving it or closing the app when I’ve got some audio from another app to listen to or to record elsewhere without interference other than that, it’s great app

title: Addiction alert !!!!!!!!!
review:
First of all it’s Very GOoD choice to spend time in quarantine ,In a exclusive ,healthy environment with good members and communities without spam contents. 
But It also can be very addictive and cause a bit of hearing fatigue. 
This app has a great potential with adding some features like give feedback with emojis.
Definitely worth try for once ....

title: Stealing your contacts and posts
review:
Why does clubhouse need all of your Instagram photos to show your Instagram handle on your profile, or all of your Twitter posts and followers in order to show your Twitter handle? 

Why does clubhouse need all of your phone contacts in order to allow you to invite others to the app? 

I’ll let you decide.

title: Listen Up! Clubhouse App for Convos
review: Using audio only for social conversations is genius! Turn off the camera and relax while listening in, or joining in on meaningful conversations. Simple concept taken to the next level.

title: PLS UPDATE THIS PLEASE!!!
review:
I’m so frustrated with this app. You’re forced to have a “nomination” by someone even if you don’t know them. Making them a feature on your page. 

You can’t turn off the ability for others to search you through your number. You also can’t deactivate your account.

I want to love this app, I really do. But until these things are adjusted I just can’t.

title: CH: The App With A Heart
review: In the first couple of days I’ve had the opportunity to listen to authentic folks who are changing our world for the better. Topics such as grieving moms, wellness for the Latinx community, mindfulness, tech ed, and so much more. I highly recommend it!
now i am listening to the cofounder of clubhouse and he says it is actually like a live podcast. Just wandering different rooms for more than two days. I thought I am so deeply attracted by this app.
title: thanks so much for this amazing app

review: There should be a direct message option, where people could receive DMs, but have the option to block DMs or only receive them by people they follow etc.
title: Should launch a direct message inbox

review:
Bring better privacy features to this app. There is no room for another social media platform that can’t afford basic discretion to their users.

The onboarding experience feels so invasive. If I deny ClubHouse the ability to access my contacts, imagine how creepy it feels when I start getting notifications that other people are finding me because THEY shared my contact information with the app. 

I’m now stuck with the name of someone I barely know glued to my profile page because they nominated me without me asking.

My eyes would also appreciate a dark mode.
title: Privacy

review: I like the app but there really needs to be an option to redirect invitations. Being new to the app and trying the different features it’s easy to accidentally invite people to the app just because they are in your address book. Can this be changed?
title: Decent App, Need Option to Redirect Invitees

review: I'm excited already for how it's being used in my field. It has so much potential that is untapped yet I believe. I think the creativity of its users can drive this app to great opportunities.
title: Great Potential!

review: I definitely see the potential, but I want to be able to search for room topics despite who I’m  following and/or search for followers who are interested in certain topics. I also want to be able to react no verbally to a room I’m listening in on with icons that symbolize applause, cheers or disagreement.
title: I see the potential, but!

review:
This platform is amazing! I just started about a week and a half ago. Im so excited of the rooms and starting my room soon to be able to share and receive. 
Thank you so very much.
title: Clubhouse

review: This is by FAR my most favorite social media app! I love the intimate capacity to network, meet and converse with people from every walk of life! Add direct audio messaging and the ability to scale the privacy of your followers and it would be PERFECT!
title: Game changer!!!!

review: Social media was meant to connect people by enabling meaningful conversations. Clubhouse does that very well. Listen, learn and engage purposefully and you can slowly improve the tiny fraction of the universe you temporarily occupy.
title: Only social media app you need.

review: Today is the first time I’m experiencing issues on the app. I’ve been kicked out of the same room twice from the audience. And even the moderators have been kicked out and had to re-enter as well.
title: First time seeing bugs

review: Treasure trove of insights, very easy to use. Because people use (by and large) their real names and photos, communication is respectful. Can’t wait to see how this app changes social discourses in the future.
title: Listen to anything

review: I just got the invite and it’s great. People are sharing real gems of wisdom and the topics are fantastic. I’m sure you could network but if you want to just listen in and share your experience this is great.
title: Great Community

review: The most valuable app I’ve EVER downloaded. Millions of dollars of free advice on any topic imaginable in real-time by people at the top of their game. The only downside is that it is only available on Apple devices. Get you one if you don’t have one, it’ll be worth it.
title: OMG

review: This app really offers people a space to network and connect, but not just in business but in friendships, relationships. This is a great platform, especially in the the mist of COVID-19. Whatever your interest is, this app offers it.
title: Great app, wonderful spaces!

review: Clubhouse is one of the audio-chatting app I’ve heard about. But, the problem is that it does not work on iPhone 7. Can you find another way to fix this, please?
title: Let me tell you about this app...

review: I love this platform.  So easy to use, follow, and connect with people, clubs, and information, while also being able to do something else on my phone.
title: Amazing platform

review: I think if you guys add photo sharing or file sharing it could really help with sharing creatives works and getting advice from others. It really would help to connect creatives!!
title: Possible add-on

review: The number of connections and positive energy I have been able to absorb on this platform is incredible, say goodbye to the gatekeepers. This is an app where friendly business individuals can connect with HIGH net worth individuals
title: Best Social App

review:
I recommend to prepare an contract with big companies to have a license that invite their employees for a meetings or short meetings. This option will be very nice and more powerful. Thank you 

Regards. 

A person who wants to get an invitation.
title: Recommendation

review: As much as I would love to recommend this app based solely on hearsay; I have attempted to sign up twice and never got an invite back…I assume you have to be famous or just prestige to use this app and it’s a shame because otherwise; I could see the purpose of this app and connect with it; I guess I will never know and neither will most of my friends since it’s INVITE only… not a good start to growing your app
title: Never Got An Invite…

review: I’ve been on clubhouse for less than 24 hours and already have learned so much. The topics, opinions, and people are so diverse. 10/10 recommend especially for entrepreneurs.
title: Amazing space for intellectual convos

review: The app is great but if u get suspended for any reason which u do not follow the guidelines it’s a huge hassle to get in contact with support team/ admin. I think because it’s new they are super paranoid and everything for them is suspicious which is ridiculous because they have bots monitoring human behaviors. So an appeal process is astronomically impossible. The app is hyper sensitive anything perceived as a violation can cause suspension or termination of account. Proceed with caution.
title: PROCEED WITH CAUTION.

review: Being able to listen in to chat rooms at all hours with like minded passionate and driven individuals is incredible. This is social media at its finest because Clubhouse promotes sharing valuable information to help others.
title: Clubhouse rocks!

review: I just started with Clubhouse today and truly enjoyed the live session. No texting or emailing, just great conversation with positive like minded people who were sharing their experiences and knowledge to help others
title: First experience with Clubhouse

review: I’ve used a lot of social apps but this is by far one of the most useful in recent years it’s still in the early stages but I’m impressed thus far because I’ve made a lot of good connections..
title: Get this ASAP

review: I’m giving this a 4 because for the profile picture I want to put a video cause I don’t take pictures, being able to put a video would be a blessing. So can you update that.
title: profile picture

review:
By far - such an interesting concept like a podcast without even having to set up your own equipment or find your guests 

I love the emphasis this app places on voice
title: Favorite app

review: I have top of the line earbuds, and since using the app (going on three days), my Bluetooth connection is extremely unstable. I enjoy the app’s content and the purpose, but due to my earbuds not being able to maintain their connection to my device, it creates an issue for me to use the app effectively.
title: Love the app, but my Bluetooth keep losing connection when I switch rooms

review: Hi! I can’t find any info on customer service support... so I’ll try here. I sent my invite to someone that already has an account accidentally! Is there anyway I can get a replacement invite? I can verify that they already had an account. Please let me know!!
title: Support needed.

review: After verification my phone number I can’t use app and message that we reserved your Id and we will massage you but after 1 day i don’t have any massage.
title: Don’t receive any massage

review: The idea is great and very successful , I was angry at first because its not for every one yet but the way you gays explained your situation you have build loyalty on the heart of the users can’t wait tell it’s get public pls hurry up.,,🔥👌🏼🌹
title: Best team ever

review: Holey moley, this app is *TERRIBLE*. First. it demands your phone number (a really bad sign) and then it tells you you’re gonna get an “invite” that never arrives. So basically you give them your information and then stare at a “Congratulations!” dead end screen forever. What’s the point of Apple claiming they’re protecting your privacy when they allow apps like this that exist to simply mine data from you? Ugh.
title: Data Mining For Hipsters

review: Please I should be able to see my profile picture the way other people see it. It’s  too small and blurry now Thanks :)
title: Profile Picture is a bit annoying

review: This moderated app is yet another fantastic opportunity for everybody to bring American style social justice to the rest of the world. Your battle cries will be heard, literally with this app. Bring down your chosen system of oppression!
title: Social Justice Channel on Audio

review: I just wanna open the app not still see that an incineration is being sent my way when I’ve had the app for like a year no disrespect just wish I was cool.
title: Still haven’t got an invite

review:
I’m apart of a self help group and some members are raving about the Clubhouse. But I’ve been waiting for some time now and cannot get admitted. 
Waiting but not patiently. I’m very eager to see what the rave is about.
Thank you
title: What’s taking so long

review: Love the app so far. My only suggestion would be to focus on the speaker instead of having to constantly scroll to see who is speaking next.
title: Speaker

review:
The main issue with this is the lack of structure and description of the rooms. There may be benefit of written word. The emojis are annoying. 

This feels like the lunch room where the popular kids are able to create an echo chamber

Not a fan of the flexing either - need substance not self promotion
title: I want this to work

review:
Anyone who is tired of the public Twitter-space filled with bots, trolls, and social bullies needs to check out the Clubhouse App. 

A much needed evolution in public discourse moderated by people having an honest discussion.  No bots gaslighting, no trolls given time to derail, and no corporate censorship managing the allowed narrative.

Unfortunately still an invite only platform, but definitely worth getting in line!

My personal favorite: Bitcoin Cafe
title: A much needed evolution in public discourse moderated by people having an honest discussion.

review: Killer app. Next level SM. Access to many quality conversations with diverse communities. Moderator styles and skills vary, experts share generously, and listeners who want to speak get called up to the stage. Hope here for a sustained success for CH and all of us.
title: CH is awesome
Lavon Unique Richardson
review: Clubhouse is by far the best social media platform because it give you room to grow and network like no other and it’s the most easiest way to build your awareness

title: ClubHouse is the Future
review: This is a great space of you are anyone who is looking to scale your business , connect with people who have been there before & make new , meaningful connections .

title: Great experience
review: I love this app the only suggestion I have is maybe a chat feature for people who are in an environment where they can not join the voice chat.

userName: Don't have one at all so sorry
title: Outstanding
review: This by far is the best social media app. Not one where we just look at pictures but one where we learn and are able to listen and learn.

title: It was all good just a week ago
review:
Just got the app. Enjoying the vibes. App chooses to do an automatic update, and now my phone has to have the Wi-Fi toggled off for this app to make a secure SSL connection. This is no bueno.

Kindly fix so the vibe and user experience isn’t ruined.

Would like to give 5 stars but this bug is a problem.

title: Clubhouse
review: Great source for information and keeping up with the latest topics. Good source for gaining knowledge and a platform where you are able to ask questions as you desire.

title: Let me delete my account
review: App sounded like a cool idea from a couple friends, really unfriendly interface and never use it though. Worst part; there’s no option to delete your account. Appeals to too niche of a market and only has a few influencers who were clearly paid and don’t actually want to be there. 0/10, let me delete my account and get off this stupid platform

title: Still waiting
review: I signed up over a month ago and yet I’m still waiting to get in when I know someone who signed up weeks after me and she got in within 5 minutes of signing up. That person I speak of  didn’t even realize there was a wait list. How do you all pick and choose who gets in and when? Kinda makes you discouraged from even wanting to be apart of such a movement.

title: Still waiting
review: Downloaded, filled the required info, told I'll get a text when it's ready. To the developers reading this don't put an app on the store if it isn't ready. It doesn't make the app seem hype it makes seem like you're trying to make it seem exclusive. Also the icon looks so stupid on my screen it's laughable. Who puts people on an app icon! I'd give it zero stars if I could just for the wait.

title: Adding a Silent Clap Feature
review: Hi, I love the app but was wondering if we can add a silent clap feature for those who speak. I’ve been in numerous chat rooms but I’m mainly there to listen- would love to have a feature to silently clap for those who speak.

title: Helene Miller
review: Just got started and so excited this is going to be my new go to for fun and exploration. Don’t know where to start so much great opportunity. Thanks for making this possible and for sharing.  Helene Miller

title: Question
review: why does it take you guys forever to approve someone’s profile? I’ve been waiting for a hot minute so I can join these chats my friends have. Looks fun and entertaining but how does this process go? Someone had to send a invite or something ?

title: A goldmine!
review: I logged on for the first time and could only stay for a few minutes but I was wowed by what I heard. Can’t wait to return and stay awhile with this group!

title: Great App - missing the simplest feature
review: Awesome concept and execution. Talk radio is terrible nowadays, even Sirius, and this is a great replacement. However, why on earth can I not connect to a Bluetooth speaker??? It’s literally an audio based app, how is this not possible. Please fix.

title: can‘t login
review: Why can't I log in my account? My ID is: jaysonyang. After logging out of my account, I log in again. "Your phone number is incorrect or unsupported. Please try again."

title: Systemic Ableism
review: Overall, I love the idea of this app. Unfortunately, it is only accessible to those with full hearing. Anyone deaf or with hearing impairments is completely unable to utilize this app. Provisions should be made so that real-time transcripts can be read while the “rooms” are happening so those with hearing impairments can fully participate.

title: Golden!!!!!!
review: To the creators of this APP!!!!!!!! Thank you thank you!!! Please leave it for iPhone users! The quality has been awesome with us!!! This was something very need per my networking business and future goals

title: Glitches still not fixed for me
review:
I have been struggling to sync my contacts with my clubhouse and my Instagram. Don’t know where to go to get tech help! 

Love the platform but feel like I’m missing out on maximizing my own potential on the app because of these two big things.

title: Love This!!
review:
I absolutely am loving this app! I love the ability to connect with people in my field in a new, tangible way. Especially during quarantine, it’s nice to have the feeling of attending cons or panels.

Again, love the opportunities this provides!!!

title: Misleading promise of celebs for logins
review: Logged into a room where the hosts kept saying Elon musk and joe Rohan were going to tune in. Constant “reassurance” from people who were texting the two, saying “they said they’ll be here soon”, blah blah. All dishonest. At one point a host even said Elon and joe would be taking ayahuasca and talking on air. If there were audio feed clickbait equivalents, this was it and it was disgusting haha besides that first big 5000 room for Elon attendance, this app needs more integrity
This is literally my first morning on Clubhouse!! But The moment I chimed in, i ran right across some strategical hints that I needed to take my small business to the next level! I’m loving it!!
title: I’m finally a part of the RIGHT NOW!🤟🏾

review: An amazing new social media app that tops all others in communicating, inspiring, getting your voice heard, and of course connecting. Thank you for building this for us.
title: Better Than the Rest 👑

review: Amazing opportunities to build a new following and network with the right people. But be warned there are a lot of shenanigans also so be careful who you interact with and check credentials always.
title: What you get

review: I love this app and I hope you keep it invite only. It will control the quality of the conversations, give celebs a safe space. Etc. it’s almost the soho house of apps.
title: Love this app -keep it invite only

review: Please put a more noticeable box around the person speaking.  As it is today it is a bit hard to tell.  Other than that a great app.
title: Love it but one change needed

review: You can’t invite people to the service without giving the app access to your contacts. That’s a big ask. There should be another way to manually type in the details.
title: Requires access to contacts for inviting

review:
To be honest I really enjoy this app but the fact that you can change your name just once isn't a really good idea 
There should be an update for anyone who’s like to change their name multiple times
title: Name change feature should be updated

review:
I would like to be able to sort or filter clubs by the amount of the club’s members. 

I would also like a dark mode version of Clubhouse. 

Otherwise, I love the app and I believe it will change the trajectory of social media.
title: Excellent app!

review: This app won’t allow people that are disabled or people that can’t see correctly that’s not right I downloaded the app to see how it work s and I’m waiting for a Invite which I wasn’t patient so I deleted the app right away I hope that they will allow disability people on here ❕ and put some new things onto the app so deaf people will be able to use too!!
title: No not it

review: This app is amazing and easy to navigate. Even though the biggest contributor is the members this app has done what Facebook and Instagram hasn’t and can’t and that’s exclusivity, professionalism, and great forums

review: I was hoping to have joined the hottest new social media platform by now. I keep receiving a series of four digit codes to enter, and “loop” back to enter my phone number.  A little aggravating, but hope the issue (for me) gets resolved. Looking forward to joining the fun!
title: There Seems To  Be A Loop!

review: Love this because it’s audio and authentic and easy to use - good real time tips from real people not just the celebs or the big heads - solid giving people - speak clearly
title: listen like a curated radio

review: I’ve been waiting for so long to get accepted. I don’t get it! Are you accepting or not? Let me know so I can uninstall. I mean how many request there is for me not to get accepted as yet. Why not just make the app open.

review: Really smooth running, seamless way to interact with industry professionals. The calls flow incredibly and I’m very excited to see where this goes once the community is larger

review: Looking forward to Clubhouse

title: The app is amazing but needs a improvement
CLUBHOUSE ROCKS
review: As a software analyst I would suggest a button to “follow all mods”.  Instead of individually clicking on each MOD.  That’s all I have for now.  Keep up the great work!  If I have anymore suggestions I will write back.

title: Help!
review: I was enjoying the Clubhouse app until I went to start my scheduled room today and was unable to do so. The app has logged me out and I can’t get back in. It continues to say “an ssl error has occurred, a secure connection cannot be made to the server.” This is very frustrating because I can’t find a way to fix this. Please help.

title: Invite
review: I’ve been waiting and waiting and waiting on an invite that never has came it seems you only get one invite per person so it’s very pointless atp

title: Requires you to give up all your contact’s info
review: I was so exciting get an invite and join the group. I wanted to pass along my two invites and then discovered I can’t invite anyone unless I give the app access to all my contacts. Why require it? That’s a lot of private info my contacts have no idea I’m giving to some company. I have kids in my contacts. How is that legal?

title: Not gonna be a good review if I can’t get on it!
review: I need an invite so I can review this app properly. I’m tempted to give one star just for having an app that I can’t even use taking up space on my phone. 🌸💕💃

title: Your new favorite place to connect, learn, and grow
review: Thank you to the ClubHouse team for creating such a beautiful platform. Excited to see how the rest of the world will engage with your baby.

title: Since this is still beta
review: People are on Facebook selling invites to get on the app. It’s shameful that this is actually happening. The guys have worked so hard to bring this app together and for people to profit off your idea is crazy.

title: Endless Opportunities
review: I am truly impressed with this app and the people/opportunity that are present. From entertainment to networking and also health & Spiritual fitness this app has something for everyone

title: Club room Access
review:
I’m so excited about the ability to create my own clubhouse. But I’m still waiting for the email verification. It’s been almost 30 minutes since I submitted my email for verification.  
Thanks
Nik

title: Doesn’t work with apple car play
review: If you are using Apple car play you can’t control the volume of clubhouse. Happy to look at this more in depth with you guys.

title: Respectfully
review: This app is valid deadass I just think y’all should add a chat feature to the app or private messages and maybe a live video function and this would be a great app

title: Virtual Networking app bringing us together
review: I hope this app remains invite only. Very fluid and easy to use. The app works seamlessly for me to navigate through rooms and use all of the functions such as mute and exit. Very cool app!

title: The next major social network
review: The next major social network - and the first one that is actually social in all the right ways!

title: Best Social Media App
review: I love this app.  Quick and easy networking with other like minded people. Been in conversations till the break of dawn. You can easily find the right vibe or what fits your interests. ,

title: Create a club
review:
I am writing you from Turkey but unfortunately I can not create my own club even with latest version. I emailed you but unfortunately you didn't answer me back. 
So I will rate just two stars! As a professional architect I need my club to speak about my personal brand. Please answer me and solve  my problem.
Parniyan Yeganeh

title: I can hear your private discussions in your home!
review: I’ve just joined, have one “friend” who invited me, and clicked to follow a bunch of people. This crazy app, opened a ‘call’ with my friend without her permission or knowledge. Now I’m listening to her and her family watch a tv show. Listening to their private conversation! This is a violation!  It opens your microphone and listens without your permission!

title: Only one problem
review: It is a very good platform, I only have one problem, every time I try to hand off to my homepod mini, my iphone popups podcast. Does it mean this app has not supported homepod mini or there is something wrong？

title: Addicted! I love club house
review: Where else can you hear some of the most brilliant minds on the internet all from the comfort of home or your car. It’s an interactive podcast and I’m hooked.

title: Cool App, tons of potential.
review: Really cool idea. Still new to it, though disappointed at the lack of science and hobby talk space (when compared to pseudoscience like astrology which seems to be everywhere), but hopefully I can find those soon.

title: The Clubhouse Life
review: This is the beginning of something mega! Clubhouse has fused the exceptional traits of current popular social media platforms and create a platform that is beneficial to all. Instead of searching other search engines for relevant content,go clubbing in the Clubhouse!

title: Amazing app
review: I been on this app for almost three days now. I gotta say, one of the best new apps I ever been on. Everything is right there and it’s not super hard to navigate through the app. I love it.

title: Wow’d!
review: This app can be used to find and do anything you want! Whatever your vibration is, you can use the app to find others who vibe with you, all over the world!

title: Proceed with caution
review: I signed up and a few days later I received an invite from a person who I dislike to enriched plutonium degree. I don't know where you found this contact information but your basically reopened a problematic can of worms for me. The solution is to be more transparent about what will happen and where you scrape your information from.

title: Annoying notifications!
review:
How do I get clubhouse to stop notifying me when someone has just joined? 
No! I do not want to welcome “so and so” to clubhouse!
 I tap on it so many times by accident when somebody new joins clubhouse, and it automatically starts a private room with them. Some of them I don’t even personally know that well, so it’s always just awkward! How do I get to turn that feature off!?????

title: Needs to be fixed
review: Great app but lots of accounts are getting targeted by trolls causing accounts to be suspended. Also for some reason there are accounts that enter rooms and get on the stage and  makes the room numbers go down. That bug needs to be fixed !!!

title: Bluetooth
review: Great app!  I love the things I've learned and the connections I've made, but the app doesn't seem to connect with all Bluetooth speakers, which is super annoying.  This is the only that does this  and I have many.

title: Notifications Go Away Too Quickly
review:
When someone pings you into a room - the notification goes away too quickly. It should not go away until we are ready to dismiss it.

Same for when someone invites you up to the stage.

title: Breaking Down Those Walls
review:
I am in the process of becoming a motivational speaker and this app is allowing me to dip my toes in the water without feeling overwhelmed.

This will be the next big thing, I am calling it.

title: I have one gripe

title: Clubhouse is my favorite current App

title: This is THE best networking app!
review: The amount of knowledge and genuine connections almost has me fearful of it going public. The wealth of information is unmatched and even in beta, the experience has been top notch.

title: I really don’t want Facebook Involved
review: I applied to work for Clubhouse. Not Zuckerberg. Already been a Googler. Hire me and you won’t need CuckerBird’s dirty money guys. Rohan I love you. Don’t make me drop to one star to get your attention. Haha.

review:
My first day on. Learning the rules and how to navigate! I am an iPhone user so I’m starting out on the right side! 🤩

It’s very interesting and I know I’ll find my way. Observing right now.

This is genius!

This app is not good if you have personal information and want to hide yourself from others on social media. Not safe!
I like the simple format that makes it easy to interact and find and follow new people or “clubs.” Also appreciate the welcome walkthrough! I love finding new connections this way

No easy way to delete your account.

Other than that AWESOME APP

I absolutely LOVE this app! You can find your own tribe of people and even new tribes that are in alignment with your life’s purpose. It’s so much more than socializing for fun on here. 

You’re continuously being mentally stimulated from rooms you tap into that don't involve gossip. 

Come on here to level up in life, take action, join in conversations and communicate with like minded individuals while executing your goals. 

Great job Clubhouse!

I like the core concept. I’d like to encourage more voice concersations. But in order to promote their network, they are engaging the worst of the influencers and wantrepreneurs

There were loads of tech issues like api errors
And 503s during onboarding 

Finally their privacy policy is abysmal. They stole my contacts forcibly so I could invite a friend

I wish the program make the nominated name be private Or make the person got the choice to make it visible or invisible.

And give me the choice to deleted my account if I want that !

title: Best App For All

review: Great concept. Deleted the app in error, upon reinstall I can no longer access my account, with no way to reset. Put my number in again, no confirmation text. Looks like I have no choice but to delete.

title: A different experience indeed.
review: Hopefully others can join and make it more successful. Great for business and marketing.

title: Pandemic Networking Tool
